mapper.sql: app.RID, app.USERNAME, app.GROUPNAME, app.IP, app.SERV_CRC, app.APP_CRC, app.LOG_TIME, app.DES_IP, app.DES_PORT, app.CREATTIME, app.RECORDSTATE
app.RID, app.USERNAME, app.GROUPNAME, app.IP, app.SERV_CRC, app.APP_CRC, app.LOG_TIME, app.DES_IP, app.DES_PORT, app.CREATTIME, app.RECORDSTATE
mapper.select: select EVENT_EVIDENCE,GROUPNAME from SMMS_AC_APP as app where app.RID = #{RID}

select ,crc1.CRC_VALUE as TRANS_SERV_CRC, crc2.CRC_VALUE as TRANS_APP_CRC from SMMS_AC_APP as app left join smms_crc_mapting as crc1 on app.SERV_CRC = crc1.CRC_KEY left join smms_crc_mapting as crc2 on app.APP_CRC = crc2.CRC_KEY where app.RID = #{RID} and app.RECORDSTATE='0' and (crc1.CRC_TYPE='a' or crc1.CRC_TYPE ='r' or crc1.CRC_TYPE ='t') and (crc2.CRC_TYPE='a' or crc2.CRC_TYPE ='r' or crc2.CRC_TYPE ='t')
mapper.update: update SMMS_AC_APP set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert: insert into SMMS_AC_APP ( RID, USERNAME, GROUPNAME, IP, SERV_CRC, APP_CRC, LOG_TIME, DES_IP, DES_PORT, CREATTIME, RECORDSTATE) values ( #{RID}, #{USERNAME}, #{GROUPNAME}, #{IP}, #{SERV_CRC}, #{APP_CRC}, #{LOG_TIME}, #{DES_IP}, #{DES_PORT}, #{CREATTIME}, #{RECORDSTATE})
